DOC.brief_summary: Methods Patients receive OM-174 twice weekly total 5 , 10 15 injection either 600 , 800 1000 µg/m² . Pharmacokinetic analysis cytokine dosage perform . Natural Killer cell activity toll-like receptor 4 polymorphism analysis also perform .
DOC.brief_title: Effects OM-174 Adult Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patient histologically proven solid tumor , refractory conventional treatment treatment exist .
